name: Simulaattori Perkele
description:
: 2D Finnish life simulator prototype, developed in ~7 hours in a hackathon.

Controls: WASD for movement, SPACE for interaction, hold W (up) or S (down) to climb the stairs.

Art: Konstantin Zotov (with some help from Daniella Pitaro)

Development: Jaakko Alanen

Notes: The game contains some bugs and a bunch of weird - yet intended features ;). The total game scope was not achieved during the hack time, so for example sauna cannot be heated with logs and there is no end condition implemented.
